channel.title: KAWFAN - Team recruitment / Feedbacks!
channel.description:
Heya,
So yeah, instead of just editing the Exion sources, i decided to make it a new RSPS. :) Since i had my 2 years webhosting, i was thinking "why not take advantage of this webhost & make something of it"..
[b]Website:[/b] * [i](not advertising, just giving a preview for feedbacks)[/i]
[u]Webclient side:[/u] The webclient is out and working. (beta version)
[u]Website site:[/u] I've uploaded a SMF forum software, but i dont really think i'll keep it. I was thinking about making simple PHP pages, and code a basic PHP Forum.
So yeah, if you want to get in this project i'll be happy to get some help. Or just post your Feedbacks. :D Also, I was thinking to release a official version when I reach 300-500 registered members on the forums. [i]I think this is a good idea because it's useless to put the official version at the beginning..[/i]
kawfan,

item.title: KAWFAN - Team recruitment / Feedbacks!
item.dc:creator: @dzeko dzeko
item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

Your site is just a default template with nothing on it o-o...
this is why i want feedbacks, I want to know if I should use something else than SMF, etc.. but also, i want to keep it really simple, for me it looks more professional.. I dont want something big.

Read full topic

item.title: KAWFAN - Team recruitment / Feedbacks!
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“dzeko, post:3, topic:439196”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=541897.msg3970248#msg3970248 date=1334084152]
did you get permission for putting up your site?
[/quote]
well, i can delete the link if you want… I am not advertising, the server is not on.
i’ve just put it to give a basic preview on the website,
as i need feedbacks on what i could edit…[/quote]
Your site is just a default template with nothing on it o-o…

Read full topic

item.description:
@dzeko wrote:

Heya,

So yeah, instead of just editing the Exion sources, i decided to make it a new RSPS.
Since i had my 2 years webhosting, i was thinking “why not take advantage of this webhost & make something of it”…

Website: *
(not advertising, just giving a preview for feedbacks)

Webclient side:
The webclient is out and working. (beta version)

Website site:
I’ve uploaded a SMF forum software, but i dont really think i’ll keep it.
I was thinking about making simple PHP pages, and code a basic PHP Forum.

So yeah, if you want to get in this project i’ll be happy to get some help.
Or just post your Feedbacks.
Also, I was thinking to release a official version when I reach 300-500 registered members on the forums.
I think this is a good idea because it’s useless to put the official version at the beginning…

kawfan,
